title: Road To Perdition graphic novels
description:
ROAD TO PERDITION & ON THE ROAD TO PERDITION 1-3

Road to Perdition is a series of graphic novels written by Max Allan Collins and illustrated by various artists.
They were published by Paradox Press (an imprint of DC Comics).
This series are set in the American depression and prohibition era.
It follows the life of Michael O'Sullivan and his son after a series of events that put them on the run.
It borrows themes from the classic and highly recommended Lone Wolf & Cub, which you can get here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4412025/Lone_Wolf_and_Cub_(1-28) 
And like that series, this is too in beautiful black and white.


This torrent contains:

Road To Perdition
Written by Max Allan Collins.
Illustrated by Richard Piers Rayner.
Published in 1998.

On The Road To Perdition - Oasis (1 of 3)
Written by Max Allan Collins.
Illustrated by Jose Luis Garcia-Lopez and Josef Rubinstein.
Published in 2003.

On The Road To Perdition - Sanctuary (2 of 3)
Written by Max Allan Collins.
Illustrated by Steve Lieber.
Published in 2003.
